submission:
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        d = n - 1
        edges = [i + 1 for i in range(n - 1)]
        vis = [False] * n
        ans = []
        for q in queries:
            u, v = q
            if vis[u] or vis[v]:
                ans.append(d)
                continue
            p = edges[u]
            td = 1
            while p < v:
                vis[p] = True
                p = edges[p]
                td += 1
            edges[u] = v
            d += -td + 1
            ans.append(d)
        return ans
